comment._content: Here is article from Wikipedia about USS Michigan (BB-27), she was launched May 26, 1908. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/USS_Michigan_(BB-27)

comment.author: 7471115@N08
comment._content: My guess is this is a "Navy Day" or "Fleet Week"-type occasion, and this is the Hudson River.

comment.author: 42264328@N00
comment._content: This NavSource Military History page has a photo (19-N-13573) of the Michigan at the Fleet Review in New York, October, 1912, which appears to be the event for the Bain photo of Alabama (on Flickr). So I would guess this photo was taken in New York Harbor, October 1912 as well.

comment.author: 61191171@N00
comment._content: This picture is a treasure, thanks for sharing.

comment._content: ann account of the event can be read here, this is at 12:10 or 12:30 PM (the smoke from firing these guns obscured much as you can see) query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=9D02E4DD133CE6...
